txt.en: DNT

'Ah the great fighter. We meet again! I wish that I was in a better mood to regale stories with you, [placeholder]. It is not so, for a scouting party under my command has gone missing.\n\n'We must find this scouting party. I know each of those who I send to scout Elderslade. They are all good dwarves and would do the same if either of us had gone missing. I know I shouldn't, but I fear the worst.'
Rásmar Blood-rue can be found in Shakal-atrâd.\n\nYou should defeat Rásmar Blood-rue.
Lóssi can be found at Annâk-khurfu.\n\nYou should report back to Lóssi.
The scouting party was last seen somewhere in central Elderslade.\n\nYou should search for any signs of the scouting party.
This does not bode well for the scouts
DNT
The trail of blood seems to point in the direction of the ruins of Shakal-atrâd
The Angmarim priest is performing a ritual with the recently slain!

'All dead and slain by Angmarim?! If I had known those evil Men were in league with Gundabad, I would have sent out war parties, not just an agile scouting party! There is no time to grieve now, my friend. We shall mourn and grieve after Gundabad is taken.'
Defeat Rásmar Blood-rue
The scouting party was last seen somewhere in central Elderslade.\n\nYou should examine the blood.
Report back to Lóssi at Annâk-khurfu
Lóssi, a captain of the guard, is worried about a scouting party that has yet to report back to him.
There was bloodshed here
The scouting party was last seen somewhere in central Elderslade.\n\nYou should follow the trail of blood.
Examine the blood
The blood has been smeared across the old dwarf-watch
Follow the trail of blood
Rásmar Blood-rue has been defeated!
DNT
Shakal-atrâd can be found in central Elderslade.\n\nYou should find who ever is responsible for killing the members of the scouting party.
Search for any signs of the scouting party
Find whoever is responsible for this terrible act
It would seem the scouting party was killed and their bodies brought to Shakal-atrâd
The Missing Scouts
